org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.api

Interface RpcImplementation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Provider.ProviderFunctionality
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Connector, MountProvisionInstance, RoutedRpcProcessor, RpcProvisionRegistry, RpcRouter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackwardsCompatibleMountPoint, BrokerImpl, MountPointImpl, NetconfDeviceRpc, RemoteRpcImplementation, RpcProvisionRegistryProxy, SchemaAwareRpcBroker

    public interface RpcImplementation
extends Provider.ProviderFunctionality
    Provider's implementation of an RPC. In order to expose an RPC to other components, the provider MUST register a concrete implementation of this interface. The registration could be done by :
    • returning an instance of implementation in the return value of Provider.getProviderFunctionality()
    • passing an instance of implementation and QName of rpc as arguments to the Broker.ProviderSession.addRpcImplementation(QName, RpcImplementation)
    The simplified process of the invocation of rpc is following:
    1. Consumer invokes Broker.ConsumerSession.rpc(QName, CompositeNode)
    2. Broker finds registered RpcImplementations
    3. Broker invokes invokeRpc(QName, CompositeNode)
    4. RpcImplementation processes the data and returns a RpcResult
    5. Broker returns the RpcResult to Consumer

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.common.QName> getSupportedRpcs()
      A set of rpc types supported by implementation.
      com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.common.RpcResult<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.CompositeNode>> invokeRpc(org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.common.QName rpc, org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.CompositeNode input)

    • Method Detail

      • getSupportedRpcs

        java.util.Set<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.common.QName> getSupportedRpcs()
        A set of rpc types supported by implementation. The set of rpc QNames which are supported by this implementation. This set is used, when Provider is registered to the SAL, to register and expose the implementation of the returned rpcs.
        Returns:
        Set of QNames identifying supported RPCs

      • invokeRpc

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.common.RpcResult<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.CompositeNode>> invokeRpc(org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.common.QName rpc,
                                                                                                                                                                     org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.CompositeNode input)
        Invokes a implementation of specified RPC asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        rpc - RPC to be invoked
        input - Input data for the RPC.
        Returns:
        Future promising an RpcResult containing the output of the RPC if was executed successfully, the list of errors otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException -
        • If rpc is null.
        • If input is not null and false == rpc.equals(input.getNodeType)
